definition: Emirate/Sheikdom/used as translation for country under a chief

pinyin: A1 la1 bo2 Lian2 he2 Qiu2 zhang3 guo2

definition: United Arab Emirates/abbr. for 阿拉伯聯合酋長國|阿拉伯联合酋长国[A1 la1 bo2 Lian2 he2 Qiu2 zhang3 guo2]

sentences.english: The national team of the United Arab Emirates made the lizard.
sentences.chinese: 來自阿拉伯聯合酋長國的隊伍製作了這個蜥蜴。

sentences.english: Abu Dhabi has nearly all the UAE's oil.
sentences.chinese: 阿聯酋的石油幾乎全部集中在阿布扎比酋長國。

sentences.english: The emirate became part of Bauchi state in 1926.
sentences.chinese: 1926年該酋長國成爲包奇州一部分。

sentences.english: That should contain any immediate damage to the UAE’s banking system.
sentences.chinese: 這將抑制對聯合酋長國銀行體系的任何直接損害。

sentences.english: Glad to know about zero-carbon project in Abu Dhabi's desert.
sentences.chinese: 很高興能聽到有關阿布扎比酋長國沙漠的零碳項目。

sentences.english: Abu Dhabi is one of seven semiautonomous emirates that make up the UAE.
sentences.chinese: 阿布扎比是阿聯酋七個半自治酋長國之一。

sentences.english: In addition, the Emirates and also the town of Jebel Ali Shehata Hong Kong and other places.
sentences.chinese: 此外，該酋長國還有哈塔鎮和傑貝爾阿里港等地。

sentences.english: The emirate has been performing quite well in sectors in which it has traditionally been successful.
sentences.chinese: 該酋長國傳統上較爲成功的行業一直表現上佳。

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zhong1 xin1
Yi1 bi3 li4 ya4 Ban4 dao3

definition: variant of 戰略伙伴|战略伙伴[zhan4 lu:e4 huo3 ban4]

pinyin: Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2
